overview: Hold on tight as Director CHI CHI LARUE takes you on a nonstop fast paced sexual adventure. Already one of the most talked about features of the year C1R's top all-male exclusives CAMERON MARSHALL, JOHNNY HAZZARD, & BLAKE RILEY, make their Bi-Sexual feature debut. An outstanding supporting cast including WOLF HUDSON, SHY LOVE,BRITNEY AMBER, RYAN ALEXANDER, and LEE STEPHENS.
title: Shifting Gears
